    • release

      public void release​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event, java.lang.String name, boolean startingInTile)
      Controls the release event. When drag starts in tilepane adds a new imageView of the same plant to the center pane
      Parameters:
      event - the mouseevent
      name - the name or key of the plant being released
      startingInTile - boolean to inform if drag started in tile pane

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      Polygon - drawn by user

    • drawPlot

      public void drawPlot​(double scale)
      Iterates over the boundary ArrayLists in Garden to draw plot to screen. Calls iteratePlot() to translate and scale the plot
      Parameters:
      double - scale

    • drawFreehandPart

      public void drawFreehandPart​(double scale)

      Parameters:
      double - scale

    • drawToCanvas

      public void drawToCanvas​(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas)

    • iteratePlot

      public void iteratePlot​(java.util.ListIterator<double[]> itr, java.util.ArrayList<double[]> list, boolean isPolygon, double scale)
      Scales and translates all the points onto the screen by calling drawLine in View
      Parameters:
      Iterator - itr
      ArrayList - representing which plot boundary list, outline or polygonCorners
      boolean - isPolygon representing if the boundary is a polygon
      double - scale

    • scalePlot

      public void scalePlot()
      Using the extreme x and y coordinates, the pixel lengths of the maximum minus minimum are determined. Then, these lengths are divided by desired lengths to determine scale. The minimum is used as the scale and drawPlot is called

    • settingDimensionLine

      public void settingDimensionLine​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event, boolean isPressed)
      Called when user is drawing. Updates the canvas of the relevant view and calculates the number of pixels from the starting and ending point of line
      Parameters:
      MouseEvent -
      Boolean - describing whether mouse is pressed for the first time

    • settingLength

      public void settingLength​(double length)
      Called after user hits enter after inputting the dimension of their line, in feet. Sets the length per pixel in model by dividing user inputted value by the number of pixels in the line
      Parameters:
      double - representing the user inputted line dimension
